name: Inner Darkness (Fan22)
description:
You are an Adventurer Consumed by darkness, fight using your own darkness, so you may one day become normal again and restore light in the world...

-Be careful when shooting, your own bullets can harm you, and the "shadows" they leave behind.

-Press Space to reset the game.

//Disclaimer: Due to certain personal issues the game, which was supposed to be a short adventure - exploration game for the Jam, ended up being basically a demo.
